name: Support for Zotero
description: Very rudimentary script meant to insert Zotero citations in Markdown. Citations use the Pandoc format (e.g. `[@something1971]`). So, the Citations will be properly converted with the rest of the Markdown thanks to Pandoc. The script has dependencies: - Zotero must be installed and running with the Better Bibtex Extension - Curl must be available in the path (it should be the case is you are using a Unix OS) If you need more options, you can open an issue on QOwnNotes Scripts Forge
